name: sample-analytics-plugin
description: A sample analytics plugin that tracks user actions and generates reports. This plugin serves as a template for developing custom plugins for FlexiPlatform.
author: Manus AI

enableTracking.description: Enable or disable user action tracking

trackingInterval.description: Interval in milliseconds for aggregating tracking data

retentionDays.description: Number of days to retain analytics data

excludedEvents.description: List of event types to exclude from tracking
